name: The Prospector
description: [Photograph: Paul Clarke] For me, chocolate is one of the most appealing flavors in the culinary universe, but it's hard to make into a decent cocktail. Not that there aren't plenty of chocolate-laden drinks out there. But most of the...
recipeIngredient: large strip of lemon zest, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Twist lemon zest over drink and use as garnish.
